attributes.action: Abolish prescription charges for English people.
attributes.background:
To give English people equality within this United Kingdom it is only fair that we have free prescriptions as we are the only nation within the union that currently pays for them.

How can we be united if we are not equal?

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108078

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
